title: SAMSUNG 253 L Frost Free Double Door 2 Star Refrigerator with Base Drawer  (Elegant Inox, RT28T3122S8/HL)

product_specification.In The Box:
1 Unit Refrigerator
User Manual with Warranty Card
product_specification.Installation & Demo: Authorised Service Engineer will install the Refrigerator, make it operational and explain the below details. 1. How to Use, 2. Features,3. Do's and Dont's.
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year on Product and 10 Years on Compressor From Samsung
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: All Parts Excluding Plastic Parts, Glassware, Bulb and Tube from the Date of Purchase Against Defective Material and Workmanship
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Parts: Plastic / Glassware / Bulb / Tube. Any Accessories External to the Product. The Product is Not Used According to the Instructions Given in the Instructions Manual. Defects Caused by Improper Use as Determined by the Company Personnel. Modification or Alteration of Any Nature made in the Electrical Circuitry or Physical Construction of the Set. Site (Where the Premises is Kept) Conditions That do Not Confirm to the Recommended Operating Conditions of the Machine. The Serial Number is Removed, Altered or Obliterated from the Machine. Defects Due to Cause Beyond Control Like Lightening, Abnormal Voltage, Acts of God or While in Transit to the Service Centres or Purchasers Residence

product_description.Digital Inverter Technology: Equipped with the Digital Inverter Technology, this refrigerator from Samsung offers enhanced energy efficiency, operates at a lower noise level, and is durable as well. Here, the Digital Inverter Compressor senses the cooling requirements of the refrigerator and automatically adjusts its speed, thereby helping you save up to 50% power.
product_description.Base Stand Drawer: With this refrigerator in your home, you don’t need to find a different spot to keep vegetables like potatoes and onions that don’t need to be refrigerated. The large-sized Base Stand Drawer that is present at the lower part of this refrigerator offers sufficient space to keep veggies at room temperature.

review:
Looking very Big size,Good for Big family when it convertible to Fridge,ice making is very fast,operating temperature setting pad is in deep freezer door,

It runs in inverter also,it takes 100 wats /hour.

freezer not have lighting option,fridge having good LED light it looking super bright.

On Next day of delivery installation done smoothly ,Latest 2020 model received.

Over all good ,Thanks to Flipkart.

Colour "pebble blue" of the fridge is awesome. It looks classy. packaging is also good. Everything is same and very well as described. New technology, new design. Timely delivered And installation is also done on next day of delivery. I wrote this review after 10 days of return period. From the date of delivery, till now it's is doing good. Satisfied with the product😊 hope it will doing good further. Go for it 👍

Nice product and it works nice.
I bought it for my grandparents and they are doing well with it.Thank you.I recommend this for you.🧊🥶❄️🌨️
Good performance.. Option of conversion is easy and functioning as expected. But the vegetables won't be fresh if we keep it for 2 days. So only 4 star.

1. Timely delivery and Installation. Thanks to Flipkart.

First of all,Thanks to flipkart for the fast delivery, ordered it on 4th June and received the delivery on 5th afternoon. That was great!
Installation was scheduled on 9th however surprisingly samsung was good enough on follow up and Installed it on 6th June.
Coming to the product, the storage is ample and features are good enough for the price point. Looks are quite premium and the LED lighting is of awesome quality.

1) It is silent machine
2) Convertible three in one.
3) Door lock facility is available
4) No need to stand
5) Consumes less electricity like 20 to 25 unit per month.
6) Frost free machine (No iceing on body inside)

Overall Refrigerator is OK. Good for 3-4 persons family. Door alarm function is of no use as beep sound not audible. Cooling is really good specially for freezer. No noticable compressor sound. Power consumption not best but OK.Convertible feature may be useful at limited moments.Coolpack Coolwall marketing feature, useful in areas where power supply is issue. Build quality average. Color feel is shining blackish. Space between racks is low,big minus. Door lock function missing which is must if u have kids. Got next day delivery from Flipkart. samsung person explain feature via remote video calling (means self installation).
